detections.label: <<FORMULA_0062>>
detections.error_description: Numerator uses a product over a (∏) instead of a sum (∑); the posterior should be sum_a [ w_a e^{<μ_a, X~> / σ_Z^2} μ_a ] divided by sum_a [ w_a e^{<μ_a, X~> / σ_Z^2} ], not a product in the numerator.

detections.label: <<FORMULA_0173>>
detections.formula:
\begin{aligned}
   \E_{X \mid \tilde X} [ X \mid \tilde X ]
              &= \int x\: p_{X \mid \tilde X}(x \mid \tilde X) dx \\
              &= 
              \frac
            {\int
              x \, e ^{- \lVert \tilde X -  x \rVert ^2 / 2 \sigma_{Z}^2} p_X(x) 
            dx}
            {\int 
              e ^{- \lVert \tilde X -  x \rVert ^2 / 2 \sigma_{Z}^2} p_X(x) 
            dx}.
\end{aligned}

detections.label: <<FORMULA_0189>>
detections.error_description: The numerator contains e^{+||x - \tilde x_{\parallel}||^2/(2\sigma_Z^2)} instead of the correct e^{-||x - \tilde x_{\parallel}||^2/(2\sigma_Z^2)} in the Gaussian likelihood; the sign should be negative in the exponent for the likelihood term.

detections.label: <<FORMULA_0172>>
<<FORMULA_0183>>
detections.error_description: The posterior mean term uses sigma0^2/(sigma0^2 - sigmaZ^2) instead of sigma0^2/(sigma0^2 + sigmaZ^2); the denominator should have a plus, not a minus.

detections.label: <<FORMULA_0174>>
detections.formula:
\begin{aligned}
  \E \left[ \Vert X - f(\tilde X) \rVert^2 \right] 
  & = \E_{\tilde X} \left[ 
        \E_{X \mid \tilde X} \bigl[ \lVert X - f(\tilde X) \rVert^2 \mid \tilde X \bigr] 
      \right] \\ 
  & = \E_{\tilde X} \Bigl[ 
        \E_{X\mid \tilde X} \bigl[ \lVert X - \E [X \mid \tilde X] \rVert^2 \mid \tilde X \bigr]  \\
         & \:\:\:\:\:\:\:\:\:\:\:\: + \lVert \E [X \mid \tilde X] - f(\tilde X) \rVert^2 \Bigr] \\
  & \ge \E_{\tilde X} \\geft[ 
        \E_{X\mid \tilde X} \bigl[ \lVert X - \E [X \mid \tilde X] \rVert^2 \mid \tilde X \bigr]
    \right] \\
  & = \E_{\tilde X} \left[ \Tr{ \Cov (X \mid \tilde X)} \right].
\end{aligned}

detections.label: <<FORMULA_0197>>
detections.formula:
\E [X \mid \tilde X = \tilde x] = 
  \frac
   {\int e^{-\frac{\|x - \tilde{x}\|^2}{2 \sigma_Z^2}} \sum_a \left( w_{a} C_a e^{-\frac{\|x - \mu_\alpha\|^2}{2 \sigma_a^2}}\right) 
     x \, dx
   }
   {\int e^{-\frac{\|x - \tilde{x}\|^2}{2 \sigma_Z^2}} \sum_a \left( w_{a} C_a e^{-\frac{\|x - \mu_a\|^2}{2 \sigma_a^2}} \right)
     \, dx
   },
detections.error_description: In the numerator the Gaussian term uses mu_alpha while the sum uses mu_a; inconsistent index (mu_alpha vs mu_a) suggests a mismatch and should be mu_a in both places.

detections.label: <<FORMULA_0054>>
detections.error_description: The Bessel I function order is written as (d-1)/2 in both numerator and denominator, which would cancel the ratio and is inconsistent with the standard VMF normalization (the order should correspond to d/2 - 1, and may differ between terms).

detections.label: <<FORMULA_0245>>
detections.formula:
\label{eq:softmax-ratio}
g(\{X_t\}_{t=1}^L,\tilde x)=\frac{\sum_{t=1}^LX_te^{\langle X_t,\tilde x\rangle/\sigma_Z^2}}{\sum_{t=1}^Le^{\langle X_t,\tilde x\rangle/\sigma_Z^2}}=\frac{\frac{1}{L}\sum_{t=1}^LX_te^{\langle X_t,\tilde x\rangle/\sigma_Z^2}}{\frac{1}{L}\sum_{t=1}^Le^{\langle X_t,\tilde x\rangle/\sigma_Z^2}}.

detections.label: <<FORMULA_0193>>
<<FORMULA_0187>>
detections.formula: \E\Big[\lVert X-\frac{\sigma_{0}^2}{\sigma_{0}^2 + \sigma_{Z}^2} P \tilde X \rVert^2\Big] =  \E\Big[\lVert\frac{\sigma_{Z}^2}{\sigma_{0}^2 + \sigma_{Z}^2}PX\rVert^2\Big]+\E\Big[\lVert\frac{\sigma_{0}^2}{\sigma_{0}^2 + \sigma_{Z}^2} PZ \rVert^2\Big]=\frac{\sigma_Z^4d\sigma_{0}^2+\sigma_0^4d\sigma_{Z}^2}{(\sigma_{0}^2 + \sigma_{Z}^2)^2}=\frac{d\sigma_0^2\sigma_{Z}^2}{\sigma_{0}^2 \\times \sigma_{Z}^2}.
detections.error_description: Incorrect simplification: (σ0^2 + σZ^2)^2 in the denominator was treated as σ0^2 σZ^2, which leads to the erroneous result d. The correct simplification is d σ0^2 σZ^2 /(σ0^2 + σZ^2).

detections.label: <<FORMULA_0206>>
<<FORMULA_0060>>
detections.error_description: In the manifold-case formula, the final expression shows I_{(d-1)/2}(R ||X_parallel||/sigma_Z^2) divided by I_{(d-1)/2}(R ||X_parallel||/sigma_Z^2), i.e., the same order in numerator and denominator cancels to 1; this is highly likely a typo. The denominator should have a different order (e.g., I_{(d-1)/2}(...)/I_{(d+1)/2}(...)) or a different argument.

detections.label: <<FORMULA_0294>>
detections.formula: \textrm{Pr}\Bigg[\Big|\Big|\frac{1}{L}\sum_{t=1}^LX_te^{\langle X_t,\tilde x\rangle/\sigma_Z^2}-\E[ Xe^{\langle X, \tilde x \rangle / \sigma_{Z}^2}]\Big|\Big|_\infty<Re^{\frac{R||\tilde x||_2}{\sigma_Z^2}}\sqrt{\frac{2}{L}\ln\bigg(\frac{2d}{\delta}\bigg)}\Bigg]\ge 1-\delta.

detections.label: <<FORMULA_0296>>
detections.formula: \textrm{Pr}\Bigg[\Big|\frac{1}{L}\sum_{t=1}^Le^{\langle X_t,\tilde x\rangle/\sigma_Z^2}-\E[ e^{\langle X, \tilde x \rangle / \sigma_{Z}^2}]\Big|\ge \epsilon]\le 2\exp\Bigg[-\frac{2L\epsilon^2}{\Big(\exp\big(\frac{\sigma_Z^2}{R||\tilde x||_2}\big)-\exp\big(-\frac{R||\tilde x||_2}{\sigma_Z^2}\big)\Big)^2}\Bigg]=2\exp\Bigg[-\frac{L\epsilon^2}{2\sinh^2\big(\frac{R||\tilde x||_2}{\sigma_Z^2}\big)}\Bigg].
detections.error_description: The expression (e^{A} - e^{-B})^2 with A = σ_Z^2/(R||x||_2) and B = R||x||_2/σ_Z^2 is rewritten as 2 sinh^2(B). This is incorrect in general (A ≠ B; AB = 1). The correct relation is (e^{A} - e^{-B})^2 = 4 sinh^2((A+B)/2) only when A = B. Therefore the bound using 2 exp[-L ε^2 / (2 sinh^2(B))] is not generally valid.

detections.label: <<FORMULA_0301>>
detections.formula: \textrm{Pr}\Bigg[\Big|\Big|\frac{1}{L}\sum_{t=1}^LX_te^{\langle X_t,\tilde x\rangle/\sigma_Z^2}-\E[ Xe^{\langle X, \tilde x \rangle / \sigma_{Z}^2}]\Big|\Big|_\infty\ge \epsilon]\le 2d\exp\Bigg[-\frac{L\epsilon^2}{2R^2\exp\big(\frac{2R||\tilde x||_2}{\sigma_Z^2}\big)}\Bigg].

detections.label: <<FORMULA_0201>>
detections.error_description: In the first expression, the denominator is σ_η^2 + 1/σ_α^2, while the numerator uses (1/σ_η^2). For a correct precision-weighted average, the denominator should be (1/σ_η^2) + (1/σ_α^2); the current terms are inconsistent and the two expressions are not algebraically equivalent.

detections.label: <<FORMULA_0293>>
detections.formula: \textrm{Pr}\Bigg[\Big|\frac{1}{L}\sum_{t=1}^Le^{\langle X_t,\tilde x\rangle/\sigma_Z^2}-\E[ e^{\langle X, \tilde x \rangle / \sigma_{Z}^2}]\Big|<\sinh{\bigg(\frac{R||\tilde x||_2}{\sigma_Z^2}\bigg)}\sqrt{\frac{2}{L}\ln\bigg(\frac{2}{\delta}\bigg)}\Bigg]\ge1-\delta

detections.label: <<FORMULA_0203>>
<<FORMULA_0309>>
detections.formula:
&F\Big(E,\big(\frac{1}{\epsilon}W_{PV},\epsilon W_{KQ}\big)\Big)=\frac{1}{\epsilon}W_{PV} X_{1:L}\Bigg[\frac{1}{L}\\geft( \mathbbm{1}_L +\epsilon \big( X_{1:L}^T W_{KQ}\tilde X-(\frac{1}{L}\sum_t X_t^TW_{KQ}\tilde X)\mathbbm{1}_L\big) + O(\epsilon^2)\right)\Bigg]\nonumber\\
&=\frac{1}{\epsilon} W_{PV}\bar X
+ \frac{1}{L}W_{PV}\sum_{t=1}^LX_t(X_t-\bar X)^TW_{KQ}\tilde X+O(\epsilon),
detections.error_description: Malformed grouping: '\geft(' appears instead of '\left(', indicating a missing/incorrect opening parenthesis around the inner expression after 1/L.
